meanings.definition: A magnetic tape used for recording and playing back video and sound.
meanings.sent1: I watched a movie on videotape last night.
meanings.sent2: The videotape got stuck in the VCR.
meanings.sent3: The cat thought the videotape was a toy and started playing with it.
meanings.sent4: Her memories were like a tangled videotape, full of moments she couldn't forget.
meanings.sent5: The old videotape contained precious family moments that she cherished.

meanings.sent1: He wanted to videotape the school play for his parents.
meanings.sent2: She decided to videotape her dance performance to watch later.
meanings.sent3: The squirrel tried to videotape the birds chirping in the tree.
meanings.sent4: His mind seemed to videotape every detail of the crime scene.
meanings.sent5: The camera was ready to videotape the live concert.
